mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Health
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Diet and exercise for the holidays
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This show topic is eat, drink, and be merry and tomorrow you may be sorry! The holidays are upon us, with all their cookies, pies, treats, and cocktails. Our New Year's resolution diets and exercise programs are still a good week away, but the goodies are on our plates today!
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: George Mason University "Frankly Speaking" radio show collection
